name: Elite Flight Training & Aircraft Management, LLC
about: Elite Flight Training & Aircraft Management, LLC, founded in 2009, is a private flight school located at the Greater Kankakee Airport, just 60 minutes south of Chicago. We offer a worry-free learning environment with no waiting for takeoff on our two large runways. Our programs include Private, Commercial, and Multi-Engine ratings, utilizing advanced aircraft such as the Piper Arrow equipped with Garmin GPS. We provide customized flight training to fit any schedule, ensuring students receive essential and progressive instruction. With a student-faculty ratio of 2:1 and a team of experienced instructors, we are committed to delivering high-quality training and aircraft management services. Contact us to start your aviation journey today.
